name: Act 1
summary:
A game about a guy who migrated to Japan to become a NEET.
Sodapoppin was once a popular video game streamer, but he met his match when he became a video game himself. Now, he's stuck in a never-ending loop of being killed by players and then respawning, only to be killed again. His screams can be heard echoing through the game world, as he suffers for eternity.
